member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect
member.summary: Blurs an image in a particular direction. You can use this effect to make an image look as if it is in motion or to emphasize an animated image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Directional blur effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DirectionalBlurEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the DirectionalBlurEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for DirectionalBlur effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Optimization
member.summary: Level of performance optimization. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.BorderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the border mode for edge pixels. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.BlurAmount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of blur to be applied to the image. Default value 3.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Angle
member.summary: Angle of the blur relative to the x-axis, in the counterclockwise direction. Units are specified in radians. Default value 0, range 0 to 2*pi.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1DirectionalBlur GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Inputs
member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Properties
member.summary: Gets the collection of properties specific to the current effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0), and identity transform on the specified drawing session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0) with the specified transform transform on the specified drawing session.
